reviewText: The best film of this genre from China so far. A court drama that will keep you glue you to the screen from beginning to finish, you will not want to miss any minute of it.  The storyline is fascinating and almost everyone in the cast deserves an Oscar for their performance. If you like mystery, high drama, twists an turns plot, and a touching ending, this film is for you. By the way, my copy plays on my regular DVD machine without a problem.
